snippet: Few who have spent time with Israel’s decision makers recently have come away believing that the talk of a military assault on Iran is merely a scripted act of public diplomacy.
abstract: Memo From Jerusalem; some see Israel’s talk of a military assault on Iran as a scripted act of public diplomacy, which has been the catalyst for the world to agree on harsh sanctions on Iran's energy and banking sectors; it may also be an addition--or prelude to--a real attack the country is debating against Iran.
lead_paragraph: Few who have spent time with Israel’s decision makers recently have come away believing that the talk of a military assault on Iran is merely a scripted act of public diplomacy.

headline.seo: In Israel, Talk of Attacking Iran Transcends Idle Chatter
headline.main: When Talk of War Transcends Idle Chatter
headline.print_headline: When Talk of War Transcends Idle Chatter
